Contact
Get In Touch
We will not share or sell subscriber information with 3rd parties for their direct marketing purposes. No mobile information will be shared with third parties/affiliates for marketing/promotional purposes. All the above categories exclude text messaging originator opt-in data and consent; this information will not be shared with any third parties. By selecting the Check Box on The Bookings Check Out Page Guests Agree to Receive Marketing SMS. Guests may receive a SMS prior/during/after their stay with us.
Reply STOP to Opt Out. Standard message and data rates may apply.
17500 NE US Highway 301, Waldo, FL 32694
(352) 559-8712

About Us
Experience  Warm Hospitality
Here at Gainesville your overall experience is important to us. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back year after year.
Experience  Warm Hospitality
Here at Gainesville your overall experience is important to us. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back year after year.
Nearby Businesses
Restaurants
Our Classic Cafe, Subway, Dunkin Donuts and Wendy's are in close proximity
Fuel
24 hour Pilot is in walking distance for food, snacks, gas and other essentials.
Shopping
Dollar General is across the highway and Super Wal-Mart is also not far away.
Medical Offices
It's quick and easy to get to Gainesville medical facilities from our RV Park.
RV Park Facilities
Gated Entrance
Our RV park has a gated entrance.  Guests who arrive before 5pm will be escorted to their site.
Laundry
We have a laundry room with coin-operated washing machines and dryers for guests.
We have a 3/4 acre catch-and-release pond that is 28-foot-deep and stocked with fish.
Stocked Pond
The fitness center is now open.
Fitness Center
Restrooms
Our RV park has separate women and men bathrooms with showers that are available to park guests.
Screen Room
Our Screen Room is an open air building with tables and chairs.  It is available to all guests and can be booked for private events.
Our RV Park is pet friendly.  We allow up to 3 pets per guest and offer a large fenced in dog run, for our furry friends to stretch their legs.
Pet Park
Classic Cafe is located at the front of the park along Hwy 301.  The cafe hours are Tuesday-Sunday 7am-3pm.
Restaurant
Gated Entrance
Our RV park has a gated entrance.  Guests who arrive before 5pm will be escorted to their site.
Laundry
We have a laundry room with coin-operated washing machines and dryers for guests.
We have a 3/4 acre catch-and-release pond that is 28-foot-deep and stocked with fish.
Stocked Pond
The fitness center is now open.
Fitness Center
Restrooms
Our RV park has separate women and men bathrooms with showers that are available to park guests.
Screen Room
Our Screen Room is an open air building with tables and chairs.  It is available to all guests and can be booked for private events.
Our RV Park is pet friendly.  We allow up to 3 pets per guest and offer a large fenced in dog run, for our furry friends to stretch their legs.
Pet Park
Classic Cafe is located at the front of the park along Hwy 301.  The cafe hours are Tuesday-Sunday 7am-3pm.
Restaurant
Reservations Include
The following amenities are included with each reservation…
Electrical Hookup
Water Hookup
Sewer Hookup (most sites)
WiFi
Parking
Access to group Facilities
Access to Laundry Facilities
Access to Bathhouse Facilities

RV Park Rules
Reservations
Included in each reservation: 2 adults, 2 children, 1 pet, 1 vehicle
$5 for each additional guest, pet or vehicle with a max of 6 guests per site and 2 pets per site.
Required deposit is 1 day or full amount on all event or holiday weekends.
We collect full payment up on check in.
Cancellations
Guests receive a full refund minus a $25 cancellation fee if cancelled before 48 hours of check-in on standard, short term reservations. After 48 hours, the reservation balance is forfeited and will not be applied to a future stay.
Holiday and event says 7 days to get FULL refund. Please change to refund minus $25 cancellation fee.
Long term guests can put down a $100 deposit to hold their site, but it is not refundable in the event of a cancellation.
General Rules
Quiet hours are between 10 pm until 8 am
5 mph speed limit in the park
No fireworks are allowed to be discharged in the park
Check-in is 1pm.  We ask that guests check in upon arrival or call if arriving after hours
All visitors must check in at the office
Check out is 11am. We ask that guests please inform the office upon departure
Pet Policy
Aggressive dogs of any breed are not
permitted
. If your dog displays protective or unfriendly behavior towards strangers, we kindly request that you do not bring them to our park.
If such behavior is
observed
, we may (at our sole discretion) ask the owner and the dog to leave.
Pet restrictions may vary among our locations. Some parks have limited or no availability for units or cabins that allow pets. We encourage dog owners to call in advance to check availability and discuss their situation.
Registered service dogs are welcome at all RVPM/Honest RV parks and are subject to the same rules and restrictions listed here.
We welcome a maximum of two dogs per site.
All dogs must have documentation of current vaccinations. We may ask you to
provide
copies of vaccination records to our office before you check in.
All dogs must
be under their owners’ control and visual supervision at all times
.
Please do not leave dogs unattended or tied up outside.
Except in
designated
off-leash dog park
amenity
areas, a
ll dogs must be on a leash
no longer than 6 feet
anytime they are outside
.
Non-service dogs are not allowed in common-area buildings or pool areas. Registered service dogs must be wearing visible tags to enter these areas.
Disruptive,
excessive,
or
uncontrolled barking is not allowed
.
If barking persists and becomes a nuisance to fellow guests, we may
(at our sole discretion)
ask
the owner and the dog
to leave.
Owners
are responsible for
cleaning up after their pets and properly disposing of pet waste in designated
bins
.
Pet owners
are responsible for
any injuries,
damage
, or disturbances caused by their pets to other guests
, park staff, or visitors
.
RV Park
is not
responsible for the safety of your dog(s)
,
or
for any loss, damage, or injury caused
to or
by
our
four
-legged guests.
Thank you for your cooperation in
maintaining
a
dog
-friendly and harmonious environment for all guests at Gainesville RV Park.
Here at Gainesville RV Park your overall experience is important to us. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back year after year.
